813460.name: Blossom: A Meadow comic book
813460.description:
Delve deeper into the Meadow world with a story that explores the lengths we go to show our appreciation of a loved one, and to see love blossom.

An expression of love. A memento of a time and a feeling. Talented illustrator Lisa Richards brings her own take on the Meadow style to this comic, where the symbol-driven language of Meadow communicates the story instead of text.

About Blossom: A Meadow comic book:

Main Features
  • 15 pages of original Meadow Comic by Lisa Richards
  • Unlocks a 3D Emote in Meadow
  • Unlocks 2 skins in Meadow (one for the Lynx and one for the Lynx Cub)

To access the comic
  • Right-click Meadow in Steam and go to "Properties"
  • Select "Local Files"
  • Click "Browse Local Files"
  • Open the folder called "Blossom"
